label: Behavior 00771255
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 54.3509 + 0.0015 × t + 0.0002 × t², lon(t) ≈ 9.7695 + 0.0042 × t + 0.0003 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
